articles.title: Amazon is ending its ‘Try Before You Buy' option for Prime members
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its 'Try Before You Buy' service, which allowed Prime members to try on clothing items before purchasing. The service will cease accepting orders on January 31st. Amazon cites limited reach and the growing adoption of AI-powered sizing recommendations as reasons for the change, aiming for a simpler experience with a bigger selection and faster delivery.

articles.title: Does everything need to be smart?
articles.author: Juliet Bennett Rylah
articles.summary: Samsung's Bespoke AI washing machine and an LG smart fridge were showcased at CES 2025, receiving criticism for unnecessary features. LiberLive C1, a $799 'smart' stringless guitar, was also presented, offering a simplified way to create chords.

articles.title: The new DJI Flip flips the script on conventional drone design
articles.author: Chandraveer Mathur
articles.summary: DJI has launched the Flip, a new portable drone featuring a novel foldable design. The DJI Flip drone records up to 4K video and has obstacle avoidance capabilities. The standard DJI Flip costs $440 when accompanied by a RC-N3 joystick controller, approximately twice as much as the $200 DJI Neo which also supports FPV modes.

articles.title: Social Media Users Mock 'Riveting' Walmart Logo Rebrand Reveal: 'This is Literally the Same'
articles.author: Allison Walker
articles.summary: Walmart has introduced an updated logo as part of a larger rebranding effort, aiming for a modern and culturally dynamic identity. The updated logo features a modern font inspired by the founder's hat and a refreshed color palette. However, the changes are subtle and have been met with mixed reactions.

articles.title: I've tested countless drones and the DJI Flip is something completely new to me
articles.author: James Abbott
articles.summary: DJI has launched the DJI Flip, a new beginner-friendly vlogging drone with a unique folding design and built-in propeller guards. It captures photos in JPEG and raw, records up to 60fps 4K video in Standard and D-Log M profiles, and is positioned between the DJI Neo and Mini 4 Pro in terms of functionality.

articles.title: How can AI be used to supercharge SEO?
articles.author: David Hunter
articles.summary: AI-powered tools are being integrated into Search Engine Optimization (SEO), streamlining workflows and improving efficiency. Specifically, AI-powered rank tracking tools are offering tailored insights into performance, tracking keyword positions and delivering actionable recommendations to improve rankings. The evolution has shifted SEO from a field dominated by subjective opinions to one firmly rooted in data-driven, highly targeted strategies.

articles.title: Hyundai Pakistan introduces ‘SONATA N Line'
articles.summary: Hyundai Nishat Motors launched the Hyundai SONATA N Line in Pakistan. The SONATA N Line features a 2.5L turbocharged engine producing 290 horsepower and 422 Nm of torque, accelerating from 0 to 100 km/h in 6.3 seconds and has more than 20 Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS).

articles.title: New Pepsi flavor alert: Wild Cherry & Cream is hitting store shelves soon
articles.author: Greta Cross
articles.summary: Pepsi is launching a new permanent flavor, Wild Cherry & Cream, available in 12-ounce cans and 20-ounce bottles, including a zero-sugar option. Described as a blend of sweet cherry and creamy vanilla, it will be available nationwide starting January 20 at various retailers.

articles.title: New Pepsi flavor alert: Wild Cherry & Cream is hitting store shelves soon
articles.author: Greta Cross
articles.summary: Pepsi is launching a new permanent flavor called Wild Cherry & Cream, available in 12-ounce cans and 20-ounce bottles, including a zero-sugar version. The new flavor is described as a mix of sweet cherry and creamy vanilla. It will be available nationwide starting January 20th at various retailers.

articles.title: Electric Ambitions On Course In South Africa
articles.summary: Mini has released the next-generation electric Mini Cooper SE in South Africa, equipped with a 160kW motor, a 49.2kWh battery providing 400km range, and a 9.4-inch OLED screen running Mini Operating System 9. The Cooper SE also includes Digital Key Plus, a suite of connected services, and a companion app for remote monitoring and control.

articles.title: Popular drink from 1980s making return; here's what we know
articles.author: Mac Bell
articles.summary: REDCON1 is re-introducing JOLT Cola, originally launched in the 1980s, with IMG's help. The reimagined JOLT Cola energy drink will come in 16oz cans with 200mg of natural caffeine and zero sugar and will also have 1 gram of L-Carnitine, 1 gram of Taurine, and Vitamins B6, B12, and B5.

articles.title: Jewett-Cameron Reports Fiscal 2025 First Quarter Operational and Financial Results
articles.summary: Jewett-Cameron Trading Company reported that Q1 2025 sales of metal fencing products increased by 19% due to new Lifetime Steel Post® in-store displayers. The company is also focused on introducing new innovative products to the market, which are expected to align with seasonal demand.

articles.title: Bring the theater home: This HD projector is an unreal 50% off right now at Amazon
articles.author: Chris McGraw
articles.summary: Hompow has launched the Hompow Digital Projector, a compact and easy-to-use projector designed for both indoor and outdoor movie nights, supporting up to a 300-inch display. The projector features 3,600 lumens of brightness, full high-definition resolution, and stereo speakers, and it can connect to various streaming devices and game consoles.

articles.title: MANSCAPED® Launches The Handyman™ Rocketman, Fueling On-the-Go Grooming with Bold New Style
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: MANSCAPED has launched a new face shaver called "The Handyman Rocketman," featuring a multi-toned design, SkinSafe blade head, hybrid long-hair leveler and foil shaver blades, 60 minutes of runtime, and a waterproof design. It is available in the United States and Canada exclusively on manscaped.com for $79.99 USD and $109.99 CAD.

articles.title: MANSCAPED® Launches The Handyman™ Rocketman, Fueling On-the-Go Grooming with Bold New Style
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: MANSCAPED® has launched The Handyman™ Rocketman, a special edition of its compact electric face shaver featuring a translucent amber blade cover and a matte black body with brushed gold specks. This new product retains the original's performance while offering a fresh aesthetic and is available for purchase on manscaped.com in the United States and Canada.

articles.title: MANSCAPED® Launches The Handyman™ Rocketman, Fueling On-the-Go Grooming with Bold New Style
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: MANSCAPED has launched The Handyman Rocketman, a special edition of their travel shaver featuring a multi-toned design with a glossy amber blade cover and a black matte base speckled with gold. This shaver includes features like a dual-action SkinSafe blade, hybrid blades, 60 minutes of runtime, and a waterproof design, and is available for purchase in the United States and Canada.

articles.title: Amazon confirms it's axing huge perk for Prime members – but there's still two weeks left to use ‘convenient' benefit
articles.author: Freelance writer
articles.summary: Amazon is phasing out its 'Try Before You Buy' perk for Prime members, which allowed customers to order and try clothing, shoes, and accessories at home before paying. The company cites the increasing use of AI-powered features like virtual try-on and personalized size recommendations as reasons for the change. While 'Try Before You Buy' is ending, Amazon assures shoppers they can still return clothing free of charge.

articles.title: Perplexity's Android assistant debuts with live view and on-screen context support
articles.author: Karandeep Singh Oberoi
articles.summary: Perplexity AI has launched a new voice assistant for Android, accessible via the app's version 2.37.0. This assistant, which competes with Google Assistant and Gemini, offers features such as on-screen context analysis, live view support, music playback (defaulting to Spotify or YouTube Music), setting reminders, composing texts/emails, and providing notification summaries.

articles.title: How To Create Catchy Landing Page Headlines That Attract Traffic
articles.author: Ben Williams
articles.summary: Gocompare uses statistics in its headlines to build trust and highlight savings for customers. WeightWatchers promotes its services by focusing on enjoyable weight loss, and Revolut encourages app downloads by promising financial transformation. Apple uses simple headlines which indirectly promises that the product is more than just functional, but designed with the customer in mind.

articles.title: Amazon is ending its 'Try Before You Buy' option for Prime members
articles.author: Wyatte Grantham-Philips
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its 'Try Before You Buy' service, which allowed Prime members to try clothing, shoes, and accessories before purchase, with the last orders accepted on January 31. Amazon is phasing out the program due to its limited reach and increased use of AI-powered sizing recommendations. Customers will still have access to free returns across Amazon's apparel department.

articles.title: Amazon is ending its 'Try Before You Buy' option for Prime members
articles.author: Wyatte Grantham-Philips
articles.summary: Amazon is phasing out its 'Try Before You Buy' service, which allowed Prime members to try on clothing items before purchasing. This decision is due to the service's limited reach and the growing use of new AI-powered features like virtual try-on and personalized size recommendations on the e-commerce platform, offering customers alternative ways to find the right fit.

articles.title: Amazon is ending its 'Try Before You Buy' option for Prime members
articles.author: Wyatte Grantham-Philips
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its 'Try Before You Buy' service, which allowed Prime members to try clothing items before purchasing. The service will end on January 31. Amazon cites limited reach and the increasing use of AI-powered sizing recommendations as the reasons for this change, aiming for a simpler experience with a larger selection and faster delivery for shoppers.

articles.title: Amazon is ending its 'Try Before You Buy' option for Prime members
articles.author: Wyatte Grantham-Philips
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its 'Try Before You Buy' service, which allowed Prime members to try on select apparel at home before purchase; the last day to place orders using this benefit is January 31. Amazon is phasing out this service due to its limited reach and the increasing use of AI-powered features like virtual try-on and personalized size recommendations. Amazon states that customers still will be able to get free returns across its apparel department.

articles.title: Amazon is ending its 'Try Before You Buy' option for Prime members
articles.author: Wyatte Grantham-Philips
articles.summary: Amazon is phasing out its 'Try Before You Buy' service, which allowed Prime members to try on clothing items before purchase. The company cites the program's limited reach and the increased use of AI-powered sizing recommendations as reasons for the change. Amazon will still offer free returns across its apparel department and aims to provide a simpler experience with a larger selection and faster delivery.

articles.title: Amazon is ending its 'Try Before You Buy' option for Prime members
articles.author: Wyatte Grantham-Philips
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its "Try Before You Buy" service, which allowed Prime members to try clothes at home before purchase; the last day to place orders using the service is January 31. Amazon is phasing out the service as customers increasingly use new AI-powered features to find the right fit.

articles.title: Amazon is ending its 'Try Before You Buy' option for Prime members
articles.author: Wyatte Grantham-Philips
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its 'Try Before You Buy' service, which allowed Prime members to try clothing and accessories before purchasing. The company is shifting focus to new AI-powered features like virtual try-on and personalized size recommendations to improve sizing accuracy and streamline the shopping experience. Amazon assures customers will still have free returns across its apparel department.

articles.title: Fans rejoice as Pepsi prepares to launch brand new flavor
articles.author: ALICE WRIGHT
articles.summary: Pepsi is launching 'Wild Cherry & Cream' flavor next week, available in regular and Zero varieties, in 12oz cans (permanent) and 20oz bottles (limited time). Coca-Cola will also launch 'Orange Cream' flavor in February, available in regular and Zero forms, and in both bottles and cans.

articles.title: Reserve a new Samsung Galaxy AI device and get a free $50 credit
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Samsung will stream a 2025 Samsung Unpacked event on January 22, showcasing its next-generation Galaxy AI technology and a new lineup of Galaxy devices, including the Samsung Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra. Reserving a new Samsung Galaxy device unlocks benefits like an instant $50 Samsung credit, up to $1,250 in additional savings, and a chance to win $5,000 in Samsung credit.

articles.title: 11 Best Natural Deodorants, If You Insist on Using Them
articles.author: Adrian Clark
articles.summary: Several companies, including Horace, Ecooking, Salt Of The Earth, Fussy, UpCircle, Dr Squatch, Wild, and AKT London, have introduced new natural deodorant products. These deodorants feature various ingredients like shea butter, cucumber extract, mineral salts, and up-cycled prickly pear, offering benefits such as odor protection, skin moisturization, and sustainable packaging. Some are refillable, vegan-friendly, and cater to sensitive skin, aiming to provide effective and environmentally conscious alternatives to traditional deodorants.

articles.title: Amazon Is Shutting Down Its ‘Try Before You Buy' Service
articles.author: Sammi Caramela
articles.summary: Amazon is phasing out its 'Try Before You Buy' service, which allowed Prime members to try clothing and accessories before purchasing. This decision stems from the limited reach of the program and the increasing use of new AI-powered features like virtual try-on, personalized size recommendations, review highlights, and improved size charts, intended to help customers find the right fit when shopping online.

articles.title: Body Scanners, AI Mirrors and Smart Carts: Go Inside the Latest in Shopping Tech
articles.author: Sarina Trangle
articles.summary: Beeats introduced iBody 2, a body measurement machine, and iBody X, a 3D body mapping system. Goni Labs is testing a smart mirror that allows users to virtually try on clothes. Creative Realities offers personalized drive-thru menus via QR codes, and Shopic provides smart carts with integrated payment and personalized deals.

articles.title: 13 exciting updates to the refreshed Tesla Model Y you need to see
articles.author: Destination Charged Staff
articles.summary: Tesla debuted the updated Model Y, codenamed Juniper, in China. The new Model Y features a redesigned exterior, new interior features and improved technology.

articles.title: AI Use Cases Research Report 2024 with Best Practice Recommendations for Enterprises - Leveraging Best-in-Class Solutions and Services Will Be Pivotal to Successful Deployments
articles.summary: ResearchAndMarkets.com has added a report on AI Use Cases to its offerings. The report highlights growth opportunities for AI platforms and AI services. It includes profiles of notable participants like Microsoft, Oracle, SAP, Infor, and Zoho, suggesting these companies are involved in new AI-related product or service developments.

articles.title: Wyze cameras will use AI to describe what they see
articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.summary: Wyze introduced 'Descriptive Alerts,' an AI feature that summarizes security footage events with contextual details, distinguishing it from competitors. This feature is part of the new Cam Unlimited Pro subscription, which bundles other features like facial recognition and extended cloud storage, launching for $19.99 per month.

articles.title: I tried Little Spoon's pre-made meals with my picky toddler — Here's the scoop
articles.author: Miska Salemann
articles.summary: Little Spoon, a children's food brand, offers direct-to-consumer meals, snacks, and smoothies for kids of all ages. The company's menu includes Babyblends, Biteables, Plates, Lunchers, and Smoothies, with prices starting from $2.82 to $7.92. Ingredients are organic, sourced from farms meeting Little Spoon's standards, and free of unnecessary additives, with Babyblends tested for heavy metals.

articles.title: New video teases the Samsung Galaxy S25's big AI upgrades
articles.author: Patrick Hearn
articles.summary: Samsung is teasing the launch of a 'true AI companion,' potentially named "Galaxy AI," expected to debut with the Galaxy S25 series. This AI is portrayed as capable of handling complex and natural language requests, offering a significant upgrade over the current Bixby assistant. The company is expected to reveal it in the upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event.

articles.title: Pepsi Debuts ‘Creamy' New Flavor, a Twist on Fan-Favorite Taste
articles.author: Declan Gallagher
articles.summary: Pepsi is launching Pepsi Wild Cherry & Cream on January 20th. This new flavor combines ripe wild cherry, creamy vanilla, and Pepsi's refreshment, available in 12 oz cans and, for a limited time, 20 oz bottles, in both full-sugar and zero-sugar varieties. The launch targets millennial and Gen Z soda drinkers.

articles.title: The AOL experience is still kicking in 2025
articles.author: Eve Upton-Clark
articles.summary: AOL offers AOL Desktop Gold, a subscription-based browser priced at $6.99 per month, retaining elements of its classic interface and sound effects. Despite the monthly fee, the service includes ads and offers limited functionality compared to standard web browsers, making its value questionable beyond nostalgia.

articles.title: 3 Actions To Make You Ready For The Answer Economy.
articles.author: John Sviokla
articles.summary: The rise of LLMs is impacting product and service rankings, influencing customer decisions.  www.chathub.gg enables users to query multiple LLMs simultaneously to evaluate various products and services. Businesses should monitor and improve their standings in these "answer engines" to stay competitive.

articles.title: Pepsi is launching a new permanent flavor: Wild Cherry and Cream
articles.author: Chris Morris
articles.summary: Pepsi is launching Wild Cherry and Cream flavored Pepsi nationwide on Jan. 20, offered permanently in cans and temporarily in 20-ounce bottles, with both full and zero-sugar options available. The company aims to capitalize on the popularity of cherry flavors and offer a new taste profile, similar to Coca-Cola's discontinued flavor.

articles.title: 'Great bang for the buck': This waterproof speaker is $20 for a limited time
articles.author: Patrick Hearn
articles.summary: BolaButty launched its Bluetooth Speaker with features like weather resistance, long battery life (24 hours), and built-in lighting effects. The speaker boasts two drivers for sound quality, a 100-foot connectivity range, and a built-in microphone. Available on Amazon, the speaker receives positive reviews regarding value, bass, volume, and durability.

articles.title: Top tools for a tidy home
articles.author: Robyn Fiorda
articles.summary: Kind Laundry Detergent Sheets simplify laundry, while Saje Bathroom Cleaning Kit offers an eco-friendly cleaning solution. Blueland Clean Essentials Kit features plant-based cleaning products that reduce waste. Additional products highlighted include Good Juju Laundry Detergent Strips, Electric Spin Scrubber, and Handheld Hard Surface Steam Cleaner, all designed to make cleaning more efficient and eco-friendly.

articles.title: 11 top tools for a tidy home
articles.author: The Curator Team
articles.summary: Several new cleaning and home organization products are being introduced. Kind Laundry Detergent Sheets provide eco-friendly laundry cleaning, while the Saje Bathroom Cleaning Kit offers a natural cleaning solution for bathrooms. Blueland Clean Essentials Kit provides plant-based cleaning products that reduce waste. Additionally, an Electric Spin Scrubber is available for cleaning various surfaces with customizable power and convenience.

articles.title: Just Salad debuts its new drive-thru format in NJ
articles.author: Kimberly Redmond
articles.summary: Just Salad launched a new drive-thru restaurant concept in Livingston, New Jersey, on January 13. The company plans to introduce more drive-thru units throughout 2025. To celebrate the opening, Just Salad is offering promotions like $5 meals on specific dates for in-store and drive-thru orders, as well as for local workers.

articles.title: Pepsi introducing brand new permanent flavor in just days – it comes in two varieties & will rival Coca-Cola favorite
articles.author: Lisa Burn
articles.summary: Pepsi is launching 'Pepsi and Pepsi Zero Sugar Wild Cherry & Cream' on January 20th, available in 12oz cans and 20oz limited edition bottles. The new flavor combines cherry with vanilla cream, available in regular and sugar-free versions. In February, Coca-Cola is expected to launch 'Coca-Cola Orange Cream' in regular and zero versions, which will be a permanent part of the company's repertoire.

articles.title: Local deli becomes notable for inventive chopped cheeses
articles.author: Brooklyn Eagle Staff
articles.summary: Prospect Park Deli is introducing inventive twists on the classic chopped cheese sandwich, including wagyu chopped cheese ramen, hot dogs, and taco salad. The deli has gained notoriety on TikTok due to these new variations. The introduction of the wagyu chopped cheese sandwich garnered significant views.

articles.title: I tested 100+ anti-aging products in the last year — here's my secret Amazon haul
articles.author: Jennifer Romolini
articles.summary: An experienced beauty editor discovered several effective anti-aging skin-care products, hair masks, and hair dryers on Amazon after testing numerous items. The editor plans to regularly purchase these finds, which include high-quality exfoliators and serums, as part of their skincare and haircare regimen.

articles.title: Walmart unveils 'modern' new logo. The internet can't see the difference.
articles.author: Gabe Hauari
articles.summary: Walmart has introduced a brand refresh featuring a new wordmark inspired by Sam Walton's trucker hat and a modernized spark logo. The updated branding includes a refreshed color palette utilizing recognizable blue tones. The new branding will be implemented across Walmart's website, app, and stores starting in January 2025, with a rollout beginning in October 2024.

articles.title: Chicken of the Sea, Morey's use seafood collaborations to kick off new year
articles.summary: Chicken of the Sea collaborated with Old Bay Seasoning to launch 'Chicken of the Sea with Old Bay Seasoning'.

articles.title: Move Over Apps, AI Agents Are Here
articles.author: Taarini Kaur Dang
articles.summary: Nvidia is developing AI Blueprints, offering reference implementations to build and deploy AI agents across industries. Microsoft is integrating Copilot across its ecosystem, automating tasks through natural language commands. These AI agents aim to enhance productivity and efficiency in both personal and professional settings.

articles.title: Leveling up this 2025 by giving in to good temptations
articles.summary: Nestlé is launching two new improved flavors of Nestlé Temptations ice cream: Extra Creamy Mocha and Cashew, featuring roasted cashew nuts, peanuts, and choco bits, and Extra Creamy Cheese. The new flavors are available in 1.3-liter containers in leading supermarkets and partner stores nationwide, as well as on FoodPanda and GrabMart.

articles.title: Motorola just announced a new Moto G phone with a surprising spec
articles.author: Christine Romero-Chan
articles.summary: Motorola is launching two new budget-friendly phones: the Moto G Power 2025 and the Moto G 2025. The Moto G Power 2025, priced at $300, features a 6.8-inch display, 120Hz refresh rate, Dolby Atmos, a 50MP primary camera, 30W TurboPower wired charging, 15W wireless charging, and IP68/IP69 underwater protection, with availability beginning February 6. The Moto G 2025, priced at $200, features a 6.7-inch display, 120Hz refresh rate, Dolby Atmos, a 50MP primary camera, and 30W TurboPower wired charging, with availability beginning January 30.

articles.title: Autobell® Car Wash Kicks Off the New Year with an Upgraded Website and Enhanced Customer Experience
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Autobell Car Wash launched a redesigned website featuring new technology and integration for an improved customer experience. The website offers a unified experience with the Autobell App, advanced point-of-sale (POS) system integration for personalized service, and enhanced management of UnlimitedSM car wash plans, prepurchased washes, and rewards.

articles.title: Nvidia's CEO says we're in the age of 'agentic' AI — here's what that word means
articles.summary: OpenAI plans to launch an AI agent named 'Operator' in January. Salesforce launched its Agentforce suite last year and aims for 1 billion AI agents in use by 2025. Google has focused on agentic AI, highlighted by its Gemini 2.0 launch in December.

articles.title: This laptop flips, flexes, and works as hard as you do
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: Lenovo's IdeaPad 5i, a 16-inch 2-in-1 laptop, is available as an open-box model with a 45% discount, priced at $579.99. The laptop offers both power and flexibility for work and entertainment with seamless switching between laptop and tablet modes.

articles.title: Cleaning fans rave about 'game changing' product that 'leaves nothing behind'
articles.author: Rom Preston-Ellis
articles.summary: Scrub Daddy launched the Damp Duster, a new cleaning product designed to trap and hold dust effectively. The product is a thick sponge with a rigid design that traps dirt between the ridges. User reviews praise its ability to collect everything without leaving residue behind.

articles.title: Google Pixel 9 range is £100 off in new deal that EE and O2 can't beat
articles.author: Jake Hackney Reporter
articles.summary: Mobiles.co.uk is offering discounts on the new Google Pixel 9 series, including the Pixel 9, 9 Pro, and 9 Pro XL, with the discount code PIXEL100. Also, Mobiles.co.uk is offering £50 off the Google Pixel 8a, with shoppers also able to claim a free pair of Pixel Buds A-Series worth £109. Sky Mobile is offering the Google Pixel 9 with no up front cost for £22 per month.

articles.title: Mister Car Wash opens in Duluth Heights
articles.author: Brielle Bredsten Is A Business
articles.summary: Mister Car Wash opened a new location in Duluth Heights on December 17, offering exterior cleaning services and self-serve vacuums. The location provides single wash options and monthly unlimited plans valid at all locations. Launch Properties developed the Jigsaw development, where Mister Car Wash is located.

articles.title: Canon Unveils Camera Color Matching Application: Designed to Revolutionize Color Matching with the CR-N700 PTZ Camera
org: United States Patent and Trademark Office
articles.summary: Canon is launching the Camera Color Matching Application on January 16, 2025, as a free download. This application automatically generates 3D LUTs to help production teams reduce time spent on manual color adjustments across different camera models. The application facilitates color matching between Canon and non-Canon cameras.

articles.title: Olay anti-ageing face cream that gives skin a 'firm healthy look' now £13 down from £34
articles.author: Phoebe Barton
articles.summary: Olay's Regenerist Face Cream, available on Amazon, is a fragrance-free anti-ageing cream designed to firm skin and reduce fine lines and wrinkles. The cream contains Hyaluronic Acid, Pentapeptides, and Carob Extract to hydrate skin and improve elasticity, with many customers praising its effectiveness and suitability for sensitive skin.

articles.title: Canon Unveils Camera Color Matching Application: Designed to Revolutionize Color Matching with the CR-N700 PTZ Camera
articles.author: Canon U.S.A.
org: United States Patent and Trademark Office
articles.summary: Canon U.S.A., Inc. has launched the Camera Color Matching Application, a new Windows-compatible software. This application streamlines the color matching process in video production with the CR-N700 PTZ camera, generating 3D LUTs automatically. It will be available as a free download on January 16, 2025.

articles.title: Evolution Fresh Expands Distribution for Real Fruit Soda at Select Whole Foods Market Stores Nationwide
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Evolution Fresh launched Real Fruit Soda, a new product line of soda alternatives with no added sugar, prebiotic fiber, probiotics, and antioxidant Vitamin C. The 12oz cans are available at Whole Foods Market stores nationwide and come in Orange Squeeze, Lemon Lime, Tropical Mango, and Strawberry Vanilla flavors.

articles.title: How AI killed Amazon Prime's ‘Try Before You Buy'
articles.author: Associated Press
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its 'Try Before You Buy' service on January 31. This service allowed Prime members to try on select clothing items at home before committing to a purchase. Amazon is phasing out the service due to its limited reach and the increasing use of new AI-powered features for improved sizing and virtual try-on experiences.

articles.title: Lucidworks AI Eliminates AI Complexity with Unified Orchestration Engine
articles.summary: Lucidworks has launched its AI orchestration engine, designed to simplify and scale AI initiatives for businesses. The engine aims to address challenges such as vendor lock-in and unpredictable AI behavior, providing a comprehensive solution for businesses to control their generative AI deployments. It helps companies personalize user experiences without high costs.

articles.title: Edmonton's Beb's Bagels goes the extra mile to deliver fresh bagels
articles.author: Jaclyn Kucey
articles.summary: Beb's Bagels, an Edmonton-based company, delivered its Montreal-style bagels to a customer in Las Vegas. Co-owner Lindon Carter traveled over 2,300 km to fulfill the customer's craving for the classic bagel, showcasing the company's unique service.

articles.title: Wolt completes acquisition of Tazz
articles.author: Romania Journal
articles.summary: Wolt has acquired Tazz, a commerce platform in Romania, marking Wolt's entry into the Romanian market. Wolt plans to introduce its brand to Romania later this year. Tazz's current offerings will continue as usual.

articles.title: Lucidworks AI Eliminates AI Complexity with Unified Orchestration Engine
articles.author: Lucidworks
articles.summary: Lucidworks has launched its AI orchestration engine, Lucidworks AI, designed to provide businesses with control over their generative AI initiatives. The engine offers features for data acquisition, ML Ops, security and controls, and Gen AI use cases such as Intelligent Q&A and advanced summarization. Lucidworks AI aims to simplify AI deployment and improve search relevance for various applications.

articles.title: 36 Cleaning Products That'll Make People Think You Hired A Professional
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of newly introduced cleaning products available on Amazon and Etsy. These include items like cleaning erasers, microfiber mops, slim cleaning brushes, spin scrubbers, and specialized cleaners for bathrooms, ovens, carpets, and more. The products are designed to efficiently tackle various cleaning tasks around the home, offering solutions for stain removal, grime elimination, and overall home maintenance.

articles.title: all® free clear detergent Becomes the First-Ever Laundry Brand in the US to Introduce NaviLens Technology on its Packaging
articles.author: all®
articles.summary: all® free clear, a laundry detergent brand, will incorporate NaviLens technology on its packaging, specifically the MIGHTY PACS® Original laundry detergent tubs and pouches. NaviLens is a navigation and scanning app designed for people with low vision and blindness, aiming to provide greater independence in day-to-day experiences.

articles.title: Getac's Next Generation ZX10 is the Lightest 10-Inch Fully Rugged Tablet Currently Available on The Market
articles.author: Getac
articles.summary: The ZX10 features powerful AI-ready performance, intuitive Android functionality, and fully rugged reliability. It is ideally suited for challenging field-based tasks.

articles.title: No Coffee's winter menu features Godzilla croissant, mulled wine Americano  Jan. 14, 2025 13:53
articles.summary: No Coffee has launched new winter products including mulled wine coffee and Godzilla-like strawberry croissants. Additionally, they're introducing a limited-edition '2025 Year of the Snake Limited Edition Japanese Red Daruma' available for purchase on their official website starting January 15th.

articles.title: One of the world's fastest-growing bubble tea brands opening first store in NI
articles.author: Sophie McLaughlin
articles.summary: Gong Cha, a bubble tea brand, is opening its first Northern Ireland store on Botanic Avenue in Belfast on January 24th. To celebrate, the first 100 customers will receive free bubble tea, and all other drinks will be half-price for the rest of the day.

articles.title: Big changes coming to Walmart stores across New Jersey
articles.author: Chris Coleman
articles.summary: Walmart has announced a brand refresh, featuring a new logo and updated branding elements. The new logo and "spark" will debut on Walmart's website this month, with a gradual rollout across all stores nationwide, including new employee vests and merchandise.

articles.title: Amazon Retires 'Try Before You Buy'
articles.author: Newser.AI
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its "Try Before You Buy" service on January 31st, a program that allowed Prime members to try apparel, shoes, and accessories before purchasing. The decision stems from the limited reach of the program and the rise in adoption of Amazon's AI-based features like virtual try-ons and personalized size recommendations. Despite the end of the program, Amazon reassures customers they can still enjoy free returns across its apparel sector.

articles.title: The new DJI Flip has a first-of-its-kind design that could be the future for beginner drones – but I'm not sure it hits the mark
articles.author: Timothy Coleman
articles.summary: DJI has launched the DJI Flip, a new multi-use drone designed for beginners and aerial selfies, priced starting at $439. The DJI Flip has a distinct folding design, improved 4K video and 12MP image quality compared to the Neo, and safety features like propeller guards.

articles.title: New Flipkart wishlist tips every smart shopper should know
articles.summary: Flipkart has launched a new Wishlist feature on its Android app. Users can now save products they like by tapping the heart icon on the product page. The Wishlist allows users to track desired items, view details, compare prices, share with friends, and receive notifications about price drops and related product recommendations.

articles.title: Top Plumbing Supplier Selects HawkSearch's Smart Search to Power Product Discovery
articles.summary: A leading plumbing supplier has adopted HawkSearch's Smart Search, incorporating Visual and Concept Search features to improve customer product discovery. HawkSearch's Visual Search allows customers to upload images to find products, while Concept Search enables searching using broader descriptions, streamlining the shopping experience and driving business growth.

articles.title: Smeg Mini Pro Espresso Coffee Machine review: a beautiful manual coffee maker that lets you call the shots, but at a price
articles.author: Cat Ellis
articles.summary: Smeg introduced a new espresso machine.

articles.title: Finally, another Thunderbolt 5 SSD has landed, and boy is it fast! Seagate's LaCie Rugged SSD Pro5 is a stunner
articles.author: Wayne Williams
articles.summary: LaCie, a premium brand of Seagate, has launched the Rugged SSD Pro5, an external drive designed for creative professionals. The Thunderbolt 5 drive is available in 2TB and 4TB capacities, offering read speeds of up to 6700MB/s and write speeds of up to 5300MB/s. The Rugged SSD Pro5 has a price of up to $600 for the 4TB version.

articles.title: OnePlus Open 2 rumors are heating up - here are 5 things I want to see from the foldable follow-up
articles.author: Jamie Richards
articles.summary: Oppo is expected to launch its next foldable phone, the Find N5, in February, likely initially in China, which is expected to be launched worldwide later on as the OnePlus Open 2. The article hints at improvements for the OnePlus Open 2, addressing concerns such as battery life limitations experienced with the original OnePlus Open.

articles.title: SharkNinja Powers Up Global Customer Service with Agentforce
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: SharkNinja is implementing Salesforce's Agentforce to scale support and service efficiently across more than 30 markets and deliver a seamless consumer shopping experience. Agentforce will also help SharkNinja enhance brand loyalty through tailored support interactions based on customer data.

articles.title: Cizzle Brands Launching Spoken Nutrition™ as its Latest Performance-Driven Brand for Athletes
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Cizzle Brands Corporation has launched its premium NSF Certified for Sport ® nutraceutical product line, Spoken Nutrition™. This new line aims to elevate the company's presence in the health and wellness sector, specifically within sports nutrition.

articles.title: 2025 Called And It Said You Should Check Out These 41 Smart Products To Get Your Life In Order
articles.summary: Several companies such as Penguin Planner, Sagely, Touchland, Sweetzer and Orange, SpaceAid, Hover Cover offer a variety of new products available on Amazon. Penguin Planner specializes in organization products. Sagely offers stress-free pill storage solution. Touchland specializes in hand sanitizers. Sweetzer and Orange specializes in planners, stationery, and educational products. SpaceAid specializes in home organization products. Hover Cover specializes in microwave covers for home kitchen use.

articles.title: DJI's Flip combines the best of its lightweight drones for $439
articles.author: Steve Dent
articles.summary: DJI launched the Flip, a lightweight drone featuring a large sensor, 4K 100p video, safety features, and a three-axis gimbal. Available now, the Flip is priced at $439 with the RC-N3 controller, $639 with the RC 2 screen controller, or $779 in the Fly More kit.

articles.title: NEXE Innovations Completes Delivery of Previously Announced Purchase Order to ecoBeans Coffee
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: NEXE Innovations completed the delivery of compostable coffee pods to ecoBeans Coffee Inc. following a purchase order. ecoBeans is experiencing positive reception for its coffee, connecting with customers in offices and homes. The company emphasizes its commitment to sustainability and provides an exceptional coffee experience.

articles.title: The Morning After: What to expect from Samsung's Galaxy Unpacked event next week
articles.author: Mat Smith
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to unveil its Galaxy S25 series, potentially featuring Snapdragon 8 Elite chips, design refinements, and AI-driven functionalities like personalized clothing suggestions. Apple is rumored to be developing an iPhone 17 Air with a significantly thinner design, a single-lens camera system, and a base-level A19 chip, serving as a testbed for future technologies.

articles.title: Samsung revamps Galaxy trade-in program: Check new changes
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Trade-In program is revamped, now handled by Likewize. The purchase requirement for trade-ins has been removed, allowing customers to trade in devices without buying new ones through samsung.com or the company's app.

articles.title: Enhance Your Branding through Vinyl Stickers- A Comprehensive Guide
articles.author: Editorial Team
articles.summary: Custom vinyl stickers serve as a versatile tool for brands, enhancing packaging and marketing efforts. Companies are using them to create collectible designs, promote their logo on takeaway cups, and include artwork from local artists in online orders. This innovative application of stickers strengthens brand visibility and customer relationships.

articles.title: Transforming the Hotel Guest Experience with AI: How Product Genius is Redefining Hospitality
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Product Genius, an AI-powered platform, is revolutionizing hotel guest interactions. It offers instant answers to in-room questions, automatically routes service requests, and uncovers operational insights.

articles.title: Stop Doing Things Manually: Bring the Power of OpenAI to Your Business
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Product Genius, an AI-powered customer engagement platform, utilizes OpenAI technology to assist small businesses. It manages social media, answers emails, and launches in-store QR code systems, acting as a digital employee to streamline operations and drive growth.

articles.title: Walmart announces ‘exciting' changes but, chances are, you won't even notice
articles.author: Leada Gore
articles.summary: Walmart is introducing an updated brand identity, featuring a new custom font, a modified "Spark" logo with broader petals, and an expanded color palette. The new branding is launching on Walmart.com, the Walmart app, and in advertising, with store refreshes planned throughout the year.

articles.title: CES 2025: The Best Tech Finds Across Luxury Beauty, Fashion, High-End Home Theater and More
articles.author: THR
articles.summary: Shark Beauty showcased its CryoGlow face mask. Technics introduced new Bluetooth earbuds. TCL launched the QM6K QD-Mini LED smart TV, which includes features like Google TV, Dolby Atmos, and a free soundbar with pre-order. Hisense presented the LuxCare Mini Washer/Dryer Combo.

articles.title: A Tiny $20 Product I Always Have on Hand
articles.summary: The Tweezerman Slant Tweezer is highlighted for its slanted, thin, sharp tips that allow for effective and precise tweezing. It's available in various colors and patterns. The Tweezerman Point Tweezer is suggested for tasks involving more digging, like removing ingrown hairs.

articles.title: You can now get a new Tesla Model Y for as low as RM174k
articles.author: Chief Chapree
articles.summary: Tesla Malaysia has unveiled a new version of the Model Y, internally known as 'Juniper' and officially named 'New Model Y', with orders now open. Existing Model Y units are still available through Tesla Malaysia's inventory, offering potential savings of RM17,200 to RM25,600. Customers can pick up their Tesla Model Y from the inventory in Tesla Centre Cyberjaya as well as the Tesla Service Centre in Penang and Johor.

articles.title: 2025 Tesla Model Y Is Going into Production Almost Immediately in Europe
articles.author: Yahoo Daily News
articles.summary: Tesla's Model Y has received an update, examples of which are now available in Europe. This signifies a refreshed offering from the company within the automotive market, implying new features or improvements for the existing product.

articles.title: Ampere Magnus Neo Launched in India: Price, Range, and More
articles.summary: Ampere has launched the Magnus Neo, a new electric scooter, in India. This scooter features 12-inch wheels, LFP batteries, and offers a range of 100 km on a single charge. It is priced at Rs 79,999 (introductory ex-showroom, Delhi) and comes with features such as USB charging, three riding modes, and optional connected features.

articles.title: I tried a different alcohol free drink every day of Dry January
articles.author: Adam Bloodworth
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new alcohol-free beverages. Adnam's launched Indie Pale Ale 0.5%, offering a crisp and tasty pale ale. New London Light introduced Aegean Sky aperitif, a citrus-forward drink with floral notes. Lyre's launched American Malt, a whisky replacement with a caramel-forward flavor. Several other brands like Gordon's, Tanqueray, Captain Morgan's and Sandford's Orchards introduced alcohol free versions of their original alcoholic drinks.

articles.title: B&M shoppers 'running' for £1.99 lip oil inspired by popular Sol de Janeiro scent
articles.author: Nicola Roy
articles.summary: B&M has launched a new Sol Beauty Lip Oil, retailing for £1.99. The lip oil features a sweet salted caramel and vanilla fragrance, similar to Sol De Janeiro products, and is enriched with cocoa and shea butter for moisturization.

articles.title: Hyundai Pakistan launches the all-new SONATA N Line
articles.summary: Hyundai Pakistan launched the Sonata N Line on January 12, 2025, at the Expo Center, Lahore. Priced at PKR 15,890,000, it features a Smart stream 2.5 Turbo GDI engine, 8-speed DCT, and Hyundai Smart Sense ADAS features. The Sonata N Line is designed for driving enthusiasts, offering a blend of performance, luxury, safety, and technology.

articles.title: Coco Martin On Why Diswashing Liquid Is His Chosen Business
articles.author: Jhen G. Lim
articles.summary: Coco Martin launched a new dishwashing liquid business, BIDA Dishwashing Liquid, before the end of 2024. He plans to expand into producing laundry soap and teased about a new food business in 2025, exploring opportunities outside of showbiz.

articles.title: Personalize photo products effortlessly with your own handwriting: the new'Handwriting' feature from ip.labs.
articles.author: ip.labs Gmb H
articles.summary: ip.labs, a Fujifilm subsidiary, launched 'Handwriting', a new white-label solution for creating personalized photo products with handwritten designs. This feature allows users to easily convert handwritten content into unique photo products like prints, books, cards, and mugs. It offers an intuitive editor, mobile-first design, and features that aim to improve conversion rates and upselling.

articles.title: Luckin Coffee Welcomes the Year of the Snake with Apple Fizzy Americano and Ceylon Yuan-Yang
articles.author: PR Newswire Asia
articles.summary: Luckin Coffee is launching two limited-edition drinks: Apple Fizzy Americano (available from January 1, 2025) which blends apple juice, soda, and Americano coffee, and Ceylon Yuan-Yang (available from January 24, 2025), a mix of Ceylon black tea, milk, and espresso. Customers can also receive a complimentary set of red packets with the purchase of any two drinks, while stocks last.

articles.title: 6 Healthy & Delicious Evening Snacks Made With Suji
articles.summary: Suji Toast introduces a novel approach to making toast. It involves spreading a suji and vegetable batter on bread, which is then toasted until crisp, presenting an innovative breakfast option.

articles.title: Walmart unveils new logo
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Walmart launched a redesigned logo on January 13, 2025, featuring a bolder font, richer blue color, and the signature yellow "spark" symbol. The updated design draws inspiration from founder Sam Walton's classic trucker hat. The company aims to be an inspirational, digital retailer, demonstrated by their evolving capabilities and commitment to serving customers.

articles.title: Starbucks will now require customers to buy something to use bathrooms
articles.author: Straight Arrow News
articles.summary: Starbucks now requires customers to make a purchase to use the restroom or hang out in their stores. This policy change affects the accessibility of amenities previously available without a purchase.

articles.title: LG Electronics announced on the 14th that it will release air conditioners for the 2025 LG Whisen Ob..
articles.author: Park Seung Ju
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching the 2025 LG Whisen Object Collection Tower I and LG Whisen Object Collection View I Pro air conditioners. These models feature new AI-powered functionalities, including voice recognition via 'LG Puron', personalized cooling with AI Wind, home monitoring, and automated heat exchanger cleaning.

articles.title: EXCLUSIVE: Sisley to Launch Its First Dermocosmetic Product
articles.author: Jennifer Weil
articles.summary: Sisley is launching a new product called 'Sensitive Skin Soothing Care' this month, creating a Dermatological Responses sub-range within their skin care line. The product is designed to soothe sensitive skin and allow users to apply other cosmetics and will be sold in Sisley's own maisons and on its website for two weeks starting Wednesday, then through the brand's traditional retailers, including perfumeries and department stores starting Feb. 1. A 40-ml. bottle goes for 170 euros.

articles.title: LG Electronics Introduces AI-powered Air Conditioners for 2025
articles.author: Editor
articles.summary: LG Electronics will release its 2025 LG Whisen Objet Collection Tower I and View I Pro air conditioners. The new models feature advanced AI technologies, including AI voice recognition powered by LG Purron, AI wind, AI home monitoring, and AI heat exchanger cleaning for optimal cooling and enhanced clean management.

articles.title: Sip Through Summer With Nespresso, Designed For Iced Coffee
articles.author: Scoop
articles.summary: Nespresso New Zealand has launched new coffee capsules specifically designed for iced coffee. This launch also includes the introduction of new flavors and limited edition accessories, expanding Nespresso's product offerings.

articles.title: Adobe's AI tool can edit 10,000 images in single click
articles.summary: Adobe is launching 'Firefly Bulk Create,' an app for resizing and changing backgrounds of up to 10,000 images automatically. Currently in beta, it includes 'Remove Background' and 'Resize' tools, with future plans to introduce new developer APIs for Firefly Services, including 'Dubbing and Lip Sync' and InDesign tools for automatic formatting, as well as digital avatars.

articles.title: What's new in Android's January 2025 Google System Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Google has released updates to its Play Services and Android WebView. The updates include enhanced app sandboxing, granular permissions for users, improved debugging tools, new APIs for third-party service integration, and a refreshed app details page in the Play Store.  These updates aim to enhance user privacy, improve cross-platform compatibility, and provide developers with more robust tools to build high-quality apps.

articles.title: Innovative HK designs on display at global tech fair
org: Hong Kong Science and Technology Parks Corporation
articles.summary: Vidi Labs demonstrated an AI-driven wearable device for visually-impaired users. Ooley Care displayed a technology that rejuvenates eyeballs with hot yoga therapy for dry eyes. HairCoSys presented a scanner that analyzes hair and scalp to recommend personalized hair care. Zence Object Technology showcased products made from recycled materials, like tea leaves and coffee grounds.

articles.title: Coco Martin explains why he chose dishwashing liquid as business, reveals more plans
articles.author: The Philippine Star
articles.summary: Coco Martin launched a new brand of dishwashing liquid before the end of 2024. He intends to launch more practical ventures in the current year to help himself and others.

articles.title: If Your New Year's Resolution Is To Have A Cleaner Home, But You're Too Lazy To Clean, Here Are 21 Products To Help
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of new cleaning products and devices for home use. It introduces items like Wet & Forget shower cleaner, Affresh dishwasher cleaning tablets, iRobot Roomba vacuum, ChomChom pet hair remover, and a self-cleaning litter box, along with numerous other cleaning solutions, all designed to simplify and enhance cleaning tasks around the house.

articles.title: Samsung plans huge AI home takeover
articles.author: Tahnee-Jae Lopez-Vito
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the new Galaxy S series, featuring enhanced AI capabilities, at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22, 2025. They are also expanding the Galaxy Ring lineup with new sizes and health features, including Sleep time guidance and a Mindfulness tracker, and may reveal a teaser for AR glasses. Customers can pre-order the new Galaxy S series and receive discounts.

articles.title: Shinsong Foods, a traditional pastry company, announced on the 14th that it will launch a set of pra..
articles.author: Kim Hyeon-jung
articles.summary: Shinsong Foods is launching a range of Lunar New Year gift sets. These include the Masterpiece No. 2 set featuring traditional Korean condiments in jar-shaped containers, and the Picnic No. 1 set with tubular sauces, instant soup, sesame oil, and soy sauce in a camping-themed package.

articles.title: Amazon to end ‘Try Before You Buy' option for Prime members
articles.author: Associated Press
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its 'Try Before You Buy' service, which allowed Prime members to try on clothing items at home before purchasing. The company cites limited reach and the growing use of AI-powered sizing recommendations as reasons for the change. Customers can still utilize free returns across the apparel department.

articles.title: Manufacturers Giving Robot Vacuums Arms, to Better Attack Humans During the Machine Uprising
articles.summary: Robotics companies are introducing new robot vacuums with robotic arms to pick up objects. Roborock showcased the Saros Z70, a new robot vacuum with a folding arm that can pick up items. Dreame also showed off a robot vacuum concept with a similar robotic arm.

articles.title: Hyundai Pakistan introduces all-new SONATA N Line
articles.summary: Hyundai Nishat Motors has launched the Hyundai SONATA N Line in Pakistan. The SONATA N Line features a 2.5L turbocharged engine, delivering 290 horsepower and 422 Nm of torque, accelerating from 0 to 100 km/h in 6.3 seconds. It also includes over 20 Advanced Driver Assistance Systems.

articles.title: Amazon to end 'Try Before You Buy' for Prime members
articles.author: Madison
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its 'Try Before You Buy' service for Prime members, a service that allowed customers to try on clothing, shoes, and accessories before purchasing. The last day for eligible customers to place orders using the service is approaching.

articles.title: ‘They are targeting the people who bought the cybertruck': Meet the $175K AI robot girlfriend ...
articles.author: The Daily Dot
articles.summary: Realbotix introduced its flagship humanoid AI-powered robot, a life-sized AI robot girlfriend, at the 2025 Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas.

articles.title: Amazon to end ‘Try Before You Buy' option for Prime members
articles.author: New York Post
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its "Try Before You Buy" service, which allowed Prime members to try on clothing, shoes, and accessories before purchasing. The last day for eligible customers to place orders using this service is in January.

articles.title: What to expect at the Samsung Galaxy S25 Unpacked 2025 event
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Samsung will launch the Galaxy S25 at the first Galaxy Unpacked event of 2025 on January 22 at 1PM ET in San Jose, CA. The event will reveal Samsung's 'Next Big Thing'.

articles.title: How To Sign Up To Play ‘Elden Ring: Nightreign' Early Before It's Too Late
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Signups for the Elden Ring Nightreign network test are closing soon, indicating a forthcoming release or update to the game.

articles.title: Kuro Kara Kuri Optimus Prime Toy Review: Much More Than Meets The Eye
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Flame Toys, a relatively new toy company, has created an impressive Optimus Prime toy based on the classic Transformers character.

articles.title: With Venu Sports Dead, DirecTV Bets That MySports Can Live
articles.author: The Hollywood Reporter
articles.summary: A satellite TV provider is launching a new service.

articles.title: Owala to giveaway free water bottles of new product in San Antonio
articles.author: my SA
articles.summary: A company is offering its new product for free to the first 1,000 people.

articles.title: PING unveils G440 range of woods, hybrids and irons
articles.author: Golf Business News
articles.summary: PING has unveiled its all-new range of G440 woods and hybrids. The announcement signifies the introduction of new golfing products by PING.
